unalcol.ca

Class CambrianExtinctionCA

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.ca.CellularAutomata
      • unalcol.ca.CambrianExtinctionCA

  • public class CambrianExtinctionCA
extends CellularAutomata

    Title: CambrianExtictionCA

    Description: The Cambrian Extintion Cellular Automata as proposed by Cantor and Gomez in , Proceedings of WCCI 2010.

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2010

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jonatan Gomez

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CambrianExtinctionCA(int n, int m, double aliveProb)
      Creates a Conway's game of life (toroidal) with cambriam and massive extinctions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      generates a cambrian explosion

      void extinction()
      Generates a massive extinction
      void extinction(int i, int j)
      Generates a massive extinction around the given cell
      void simulate()
      Simulates the ca with cambrian explosions and massive extinctions una step in a synchronous mode

    • Constructor Detail

      • CambrianExtinctionCA

        public CambrianExtinctionCA(int n,
                            int m,
                            double aliveProb)
        Creates a Conway's game of life (toroidal) with cambriam and massive extinctions
        Parameters:
        n - Number of rows
        m - Number of columns
        aliveProb - Probability of being alive in the initial state of the CA
